name: Candice Meade
quote: Erin has given so generously of herself, her heart, her myriad skills and her creative vision to the Garden. She has provided a rare kind of nurturing leadership that has enabled me to love my work, and grow in my role in my time with ICG. I am forever grateful for the opportunity to work with Erin, towards the mission that ICG so strongly values and strives for.

name: Kartik Sribarra
quote: Erin has set the stage perfectly for our next chapter of growth, all the while leading our entire community–staff, board, partners, visitors and program participants–along a boldly antiracist agenda.

name: Monika Roth
quote: I learned a great deal from Erin about building a board, engaging donors, and building a solid team of staff with passion for the mission.

name: Tori Chamberlin
quote: I feel very fortunate to have worked with Erin so early on in my career. I knew from the start that she was there to support me. Erin saw my potential and sparkle and helped to remind me of it.

name: Ritza Francois
quote: Erin has this amazing ability to assure and handle any situation with the utmost care and energy it deserves

name: Brandon Blas
position: Greater Ithaca Activites Center (GIAC) Program Coordinator
quote: Thanks to our work with Erin, our staff, participants, and families all have a better understanding of our community and the natural resources that exist within it.

name: Dan Klein
quote: Erin is magic as far as I am concerned, one of the few magic people I have ever met.
